thread.title: Thomas P
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Thomas P

author: Thomas P
title: Thomas P
text: I love to shop online with Prestige. I ordered roses last year for valentines day. They were fantastic fresh flowers beautifully presented at a reasonable cost. They were delivered on time and also came with a free box of chocolates which was really nice. I would recommend anyone buying anything for Valentines day to give prestige flowers a try. Great company with a well presented efficient service.
